attributes.action: to revoke British citizenship granted to immigrants who are later found to hold fake credentials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop negligence and people moving on to other authorities and getting lost in the system.

rejection.details:
This petition already overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EnemiesWithin/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
